name: Crak Up
overview: The game consists of the reconstruction of a figure with a nativity subject, which crumbles into sixteen pieces, like a puzzle mosaic, and which must be restored to its original appearance by using the joystick controls or keyboard. Move the single pieces and restore them to wondrous holiday order. Published in Europe in Digital Marketing PD #007, Stonysoft #0090. Published in Italy with the name Happy Puzzle in Formula 64 n.41.
